about_the_game:
Hidey Ducks is the first in a series of adorable, casual hidden-object games with a fun incremental twist and optional challenges.

Explore 8 large, charming images packed with hidden ducks spread across the 4 seasons.

Enjoy multiple gameplay experiences:

  • Seasonal Scenes: 2 images for each season, 1 with unique particle obstacles that can be temporarily cleared with your umbrella power.
  • Challenge Mode: Play with lights off, flipped images, a flashlight, and an optional timer for extra excitement.

Collect and arrange stickers on your sticker farm to generate passive income over time.

Purchase upgrades to increase the value of ducks and enhance your umbrella power.

  • Seek out 400 ducks in 8 images.
  • Enjoy themed images representing all four seasons.
  • Use umbrella power to clear view-distorting particles in 4 images.
  • Collect, arrange, and level up stickers for passive coins.
  • Purchase various upgrades for more efficient gameplay.
  • Unlock various color pallets

Dive into Hidey Ducks for a delightful hidden-object adventure!

name: Hidey Ducks: Seasons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A charming hidden-object game where you find 400 ducks across 8 seasonal scenes. Use your umbrella power to clear obstacles like rain and snow, collect and upgrade stickers for passive income, and unlock upgrades for enhanced gameplay. Optional challenge mode adds extra excitement!
